proposal:
idea_implementation: Create or update the file kubernetes.yml with this complete content:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ai-enhanced-customer-support-system
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ai-enhanced-customer-support-system
---
apiVersion: autoscaler/v2beta1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hpa-ai-enhanced-customer-support-system
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: ai-enhanced-customer-support-system
  minReplicas: 2
  maxReplicas: 5
  targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 80

This is for opportunity: AI-Enhanced Customer Support System
Make sure the file is complete, working, and production-ready.
risks: Slow failure: unnoticed degradation accumulating by 2028-01-02
Unintended consequence: incentives shift toward short-term metrics, long-term reliability decays
Incentive drift: stakeholders habituate to optimistic outputs, raising risk of silent defects
mitigations: Add scheduled adversarial audits with hard pass/fail gates
Track leading indicators for drift and trust inflation; alert on trend change
Prefer reversible rollouts; keep rollback artifacts warm and tested
